abstract: For many months, the media munched on denials from Apple that Mr. Jobs was in poor health, despite visual evidence to the contrary.
snippet: For many months, the media munched on denials from Apple that Mr. Jobs was in poor health, despite visual evidence to the contrary.
lead_paragraph: For many months, the media munched on denials from Apple that its chief executive, Steven P. Jobs, was in poor health, despite visual evidence to the contrary.

headline.main: After Steve Jobs Acknowledges Ill Health, Doubts for Reporters
headline.print_headline: After Steve Jobs Acknowledges Ill Health, Questions for Reporters
